[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1320406][img]https://i.imgur.com/9Awo1gf.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Tabs & Modern Blue Theme Returning[/b][/color]
After many complaints regarding the new Hack Forums theme, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9998FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] announced that the previous site layout will make a comeback. Throughout the next few weeks he will be discarding the current theme and rebuilding the Modern Blue theme and tabs navigation. He also stated that he will no longer be working on making the site responsive or mobile compliant. [size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5751402]>> Source[/url][/size]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Omniscient Injured in Car Accident[/b][/color]
On Wednesday, November 8, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9998FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] was involved in a car accident that resulted in a totaled vehicle, a concussion, bruised ribs, and a sore neck. This unfortunate event has caused delays on his work while he meets with lawyers, doctors, and insurance agents. [size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5749792]>> Source[/url][/size]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Suggestions and Ideas Forum Reopened[/b][/color]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9998FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has reopened the [url=https://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=134][color=#ffffff]Suggestions and Ideas forum[/color][/url], allowing members to share their ideas on how to improve the site. It was originally closed on August 6, 2017, after [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9998FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] stated he would like to focus more on improving features that currently exist. As always, members should perform a search prior to making a suggestion to ensure the idea has not already been submitted. [size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5751411]>> Source[/url][/size]

[color=transparent]       [/color]
